name: Forever Consumed
overrideDescription: Deal [trait0.power][x] damage to the front enemy unit.
cardLoreTooltips: Of a collective mind, the massive Umbra Shroud can wreak devastating damage upon the unfortunate soul who has been targeted by its wrath. On the one occasion I was witness to such an event, I was unable to return to the Crucible for months, afraid of the slightest chance it could happen to me.
